## Part 1


::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(aochelpers)
# other options: aoc_input_data_frame(), aoc_input_matrix()
input <- aoc_input_vector(5, 2023)
head(input)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "seeds: 487758422 524336848 2531594804 27107767 1343486056 124327551 1117929819 93097070 3305050822 442320425 2324984130 87604424 4216329536 45038934 1482842780 224610898 115202033 371332058 2845474954 192579859"
[2] ""                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
[3] "seed-to-soil map:"                                                                                                                                                                                                 
[4] "152560994 173671324 63296280"                                                                                                                                                                                      
[5] "22185606 1527272669 123700133"                                                                                                                                                                                     
[6] "1331635416 297391996 25501160"                                                                                                                                                                                     
```
:::
:::


Partition the different maps.

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
input_list <- strsplit(input, " ")
seeds <- input_list[[1]][-1]
seed2soil <- input_list[4:29]
soil2fert <- input_list[32:50]
fert2wate <- input_list[53:96]
wate2ligh <- input_list[99:119]
ligh2temp <- input_list[122:152]
temp2humi <- input_list[155:203]
huni2loca <- input_list[206:247]
```
:::


For a given vector of thee values, add the third unit to the first two to create mapping.

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
add_third <- function(vec) {
	vec <- as.numeric(vec)
	dst_val <- vec[1]:(vec[1]+vec[3])
	src_val <- vec[2]:(vec[2]+vec[3])
	data.frame(dst_val = dst_val, src_val = src_val)
}
```
:::


Test.

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
seed2soil[[1]]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "152560994" "173671324" "63296280" 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
head(add_third(seed2soil[[1]]))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
    dst_val   src_val
1 152560994 173671324
2 152560995 173671325
3 152560996 173671326
4 152560997 173671327
5 152560998 173671328
6 152560999 173671329
```
:::
:::


Now apply this to all vectors in all lists.
